name: Classic Road 2
overview: Classic Road 2 is the third game in the Classic Road game series for the Playstation console, the first one was Classic Road, followed by Classic Road Yuushun 2 (the first Classic Road Yuushun was only released on the Sega Saturn console) and is too a horse breeding game. In the game the player can compete in countries like Japan, United States, Great Britain, France & United Arab Emirates. The game features different horse breeds, racing stadiums, 3 different female helpers, and the goal of the game is to have a horse champion. The player can't control the horse during the races, so it will depends of the horse training if he will win or not the races, the engine in the races is in 3d.
